changeSet.createView: SELECT DBCCN2, DBCCNM, DBCCDN FROM QSYS.QADBFCST WHERE DBCCTY = 'CHECK' AND DBCCLAIM = 'A' AND DBCCFL = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DBCCN2, DBCCNM, VARCHAR(STRIP(DBCCTY,TRAILING),11), DBXLB2, DBXLFI, VARCHAR(STRIP(DBCDFR,TRAILING),3), VARCHAR(STRIP(DBCIDF,TRAILING),3), DBCCFF, DBCCFL, DBCNCK, DBX_PASP,CASE DBCSTA WHEN 'N' THEN 'DEFINED' ELSE 'ESTABLISHED' END, CASE DBCSTA WHEN 'N' THEN NULL WHEN 'D' THEN 'NO' ELSE 'YES' END, CASE DBCSTA WHEN 'V' THEN 'NO' WHEN 'C' THEN 'YES' ELSE NULL END FROM QSYS.QADBFCST, QSYS.QADBXREF WHERE DBCCFF=DBXFIL AND DBCCFL=DBXLIB AND DBCCLAIM = 'A' AND DBCCFL = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DBXLB2, DBXLFI, DBCCN2, DBCCNM, DBCCFF, DBCCFL, DBX_PASP FROM QSYS.QADBFCST, QSYS.QADBXREF WHERE DBCCFF = DBXFIL AND DBCCFL = DBXLIB AND DBCCLAIM = 'A' AND DBCCNL = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT IX.DBXLFI, VARCHAR(STRIP(IX.DBXOWN),128), TB.DBXLFI, VARCHAR(STRIP(TB.DBXOWN),128), TB.DBXLB2, VALUE(IX.DBXUNQ,SUBSTR(' ',1,1)), INTEGER(IX.DBXNKF), IX.DBXLB2, IX.DBXFIL, IX.DBXLIB, TB.DBXFIL, TB.DBXLIB,IX.DBXREM,IX.DBX_PASP,IX.DBXTXT,CASE IX.DBXISPAN WHEN 'Y' THEN 'YES' WHEN 'N' THEN 'NO' ELSE NULL END, VARCHAR(STRIP(IX.DBXDEFINER),128) FROM QSYS.QADBXREF IX, QSYS.QADBXREF TB, QSYS.QADBFDEP WHERE IX.DBXFIL = DBFFDP AND IX.DBXLIB = DBFLDP AND TB.DBXFIL = DBFFIL AND TB.DBXLIB = DBFLIB AND IX.DBXATR = 'IX' AND IX.DBXLIB = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.createView: SELECT DBCCK2, DBCCKN, DBILB2, DBILFI, DBILFL, VALUE(INTEGER(DBCCWK),0), INTEGER(DBIPOS), VARCHAR(STRIP(DBIOWN,TRAILING),128), DBCCKC, DBCCFN, DBCCLN FROM QSYS.QADBCCST, QSYS.QADBIFLD WHERE DBCCKC = DBIFLD AND DBCCFN = DBIFIL AND DBCCLN = DBILIB AND DBCCWK IS NOT NULL AND DBCCKL = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DBILFI, VARCHAR(STRIP(DBIOWN),128), DBILFL, INTEGER(DBIPOS), INTEGER(DBKPOS), DBKORD, DBILB2, DBKFLD, DBKFIL, DBKLIB FROM QSYS.QADBIFLD, QSYS.QADBKFLD WHERE DBIFIL = DBKFIL AND DBILIB = DBKLIB AND DBKFLD = DBIFLD AND DBIATR = 'IX' AND DBKLIB = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXPLOC,TRAILING),128), VARCHAR(STRIP(STRIP(DBXPCOL,TRAILING),BOTH,'"'),128), VARCHAR(STRIP(STRIP(DBXPNAM,TRAILING),BOTH,'"'),128), VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXPOWN,TRAILING),128), VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXPCRT,TRAILING),128), DBXPTIM, VARCHAR(STRIP(STRIP(DBXPIMP,TRAILING),BOTH,'"'),128), VARCHAR(STRIP(STRIP(DBXPPGM,TRAILING),BOTH,'"'),128), VARCHAR(STRIP(STRIP(DBXPLIB,TRAILING),BOTH,'"'),128), VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXPRDB,TRAILING),128), DBXPISO, DBXPESC, DBXPCMA, VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXPSHT,TRAILING),50), VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXPLNG,TRAILING),2000), DBPTKN, DBXPNAM, DBXPCOL, DBXPIMP, DBXPPGM, DBXPLIB, DBP_IASP FROM QSYS.QADBPKG WHERE DBXPCOL = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DBCCN2, DBCCNM, VALUE(DBCUL2,' '), VALUE(DBCUNM,' '), VALUE(VARCHAR(STRIP(DBCRMC,TRAILING),7),' '), VALUE(VARCHAR(STRIP(DBCRUR, TRAILING),11),' '), VALUE(VARCHAR(STRIP(DBCRDR, TRAILING),11),' '), VALUE(INTEGER(DBCNCK),0) FROM QSYS.QADBFCST WHERE DBCCTY = 'FOREIGN KEY' AND DBCCLAIM = 'A' AND DBCCNL = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT MQ.DBXLB2, MQ.DBXLFI, COALESCE(TB.DBXLB2,DEP.DBFLIB), COALESCE(TB.DBXLFI,DEP.DBFFIL), CAST(CASE WHEN TB.DBXATR IN ('PF','TB') THEN 'TABLE' WHEN TB.DBXATR IN ('VW','LF') THEN 'VIEW' WHEN DEP.DBFTDP='F' THEN 'FUNCTION' ELSE 'TYPE' END AS CHAR(24)), MQ.DBX_PASP, MQ.DBXLIB, MQ.DBXFIL, DBF_FSIG FROM QSYS.QADBXREF MQ INNER JOIN QSYS.QADBFDEP DEP ON MQ.DBXFIL = DEP.DBFFDP AND MQ.DBXLIB = DEP.DBFLDP AND DEP.DBFTDP <> 'I' AND MQ.DBXATR = 'MQ' LEFT OUTER JOIN QSYS.QADBXREF TB ON TB.DBXFIL = DEP.DBFFIL AND TB.DBXLIB = DEP.DBFLIB WHERE MQ.DBXLIB = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DBXLFI, VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXOWN,TRAILING),128), SUBSTR(DBXATR,1,1), INTEGER(DBXNFL), INTEGER(DBXRDL), DBXTXT, DBXREM, DBXLB2, DBXATS, DBXFIL, DBXLIB, DBXTYP, DBXALB, DBXAFL, DBXAMB, DBXSYS, DBXSO, CASE DBXINSERT WHEN 'Y' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END, DBX_PASP, CASE DBXMQTOPT WHEN 'E' THEN 'YES' WHEN 'D' THEN 'NO' ELSE DBXMQTOPT END, CASE DBXMQTMAIN WHEN 'U' THEN 'USER' WHEN 'S' THEN 'SYSTEM' ELSE DBXMQTMAIN END, CASE DBXMQTRMOD WHEN 'D' THEN 'DEFERRED' WHEN 'I' THEN 'IMMEDIATE' ELSE DBXMQTRMOD END, DBXMQTREF, DBXMQTTXT, DBXMQTCMT,CASE WHEN DBXPART > 0 THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END, VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXDEFINER),128) FROM QSYS.QADBXREF LEFT OUTER JOIN QSYS.QADBXMQT ON DBXLIB = DBXMQTLIB AND DBXFIL = DBXMQTFIL WHERE DBXREL = 'Y' AND DBXATR <> 'IX' AND DBXATR <> 'CL' AND DBXLIB = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DBXTBDLIB, DBXTBDNAME, CASE DBXTBEVENT WHEN 'I' THEN 'INSERT' WHEN 'U' THEN 'UPDATE' WHEN 'S' THEN 'READ' WHEN 'D' THEN 'DELETE' ELSE ' ' END , VALUE(DBXTBTLIB, ' '), VALUE(DBXTBTNAME, ' '), VALUE(DBXTBORD,0), DBXTBCOND, DBXTBACT, CASE DBXTBORIEN WHEN 'S' THEN 'STATEMENT' WHEN 'R' THEN 'ROW' ELSE ' ' END , CASE DBXTBTRGTM WHEN 'B' THEN 'BEFORE' WHEN 'I' THEN 'INSTEAD' WHEN 'A' THEN 'AFTER' ELSE ' ' END , CASE DBXTBMODE WHEN 'S' THEN 'DB2SQL' WHEN 'R' THEN 'DB2ROW' ELSE ' ' END , DBXTBOLDCO, DBXTBNEWCO, DBXTBOLDTT, DBXTBNEWTT, VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXTBPATH),3483), VALUE(DBXTBCRTTS, CURRENT TIMESTAMP), VALUE(DBXTBPGM, ' '), VALUE(DBXTBPGML,' '), VALUE(DBXTBVALID,' '), VALUE(DBXTBENAB,' '), VALUE(DBXTBTSAFE,' '), VALUE(DBXTBMTJ,' '), VALUE(DBXTBARC, ' '), DBXTBUDCON, VARGRAPHIC(STRIP(DBXTBREM),2000) FROM QSYS.QADBXTRIGB WHERE DBXTBCLAIM = 'A' AND DBXTBDLIB = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT VW.DBXLFI, VARCHAR(STRIP(VW.DBXOWN,TRAILING),128), COALESCE(TB.DBXLFI,DEP.DBFFIL), COALESCE(TB.DBXLB2,DEP.DBFLIB), CAST(CASE WHEN TB.DBXATR IN ('PF','TB') THEN 'TABLE' WHEN TB.DBXATR IN ('VW','LF') THEN 'VIEW' WHEN TB.DBXATR='MQ' THEN 'MATERIALIZED QUERY TABLE' WHEN DEP.DBFTDP='F' THEN 'FUNCTION' ELSE 'TYPE' END AS CHAR(24)), VW.DBXLB2, VW.DBXFIL, VW.DBXLIB, TB.DBXFIL, TB.DBXLIB, TB.DBXLFI, VARCHAR(STRIP(TB.DBXOWN,TRAILING),128), TB.DBXLB2, SUBSTR(TB.DBXATR,1,1), VW.DBX_PASP, DBF_FSIG FROM QSYS.QADBXREF VW INNER JOIN QSYS.QADBFDEP DEP ON VW.DBXFIL = DEP.DBFFDP AND VW.DBXLIB = DEP.DBFLDP AND DEP.DBFTDP <> 'I' AND VW.DBXATR = 'VW' LEFT OUTER JOIN QSYS.QADBXREF TB ON TB.DBXFIL = DEP.DBFFIL AND TB.DBXLIB = DEP.DBFLIB WHERE VW.DBXLIB = 'JIDTAONT '

changeSet.author: in434jag (generated)
changeSet.createView: SELECT DBXLFI, VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXOWN,TRAILING),128), 1, VALUE(DBXWCO,SUBSTR(' ',1,1)), DBXDFN, DBXUPD, DBXLB2, DBXFIL, DBXLIB, CASE DBXINSERT WHEN 'Y' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END, DBX_PASP,DBXDELETE, VARCHAR(STRIP(DBXDEFINER),128) FROM QSYS.QADBXREF WHERE DBXATR = 'VW' AND DBXLIB = 'JIDTAONT '
